divs: Sighting DetailsABOUT 22:30HOURS =10:30PM A BALL SHAPED OBJECT THE SIZE OF A HOUSE ABOUT 3,000 FEET IN THE AIR SOME SOME SAY 200 FEET IN AIR IT WAS GLOWING A GOLD COLOR IT WAS MOVING BUT WAS OVER A U.S.GOVERMENT INSTALLATION 1501 BANNISTER ROAD THE U.S.DEPT.OF ENERGY.ALOS THERE WAS SEVERAL OTHER SIGHTINGS OVER SECURE U.S.MILITARY AREA'S IN THE GREATER KANSAS CITY AREA'S BOTH MISSOURI AND KANSAS.THIS OBJECT MOVED IN A WEST KANSAS CITY MISSOURI AND WEST KANSAS CITY KANSAS ABOUT 20 MPH .IT MADE NO SOUND AND CAUSED NO-ELECTRICAL BLACK-OUTS IN RADIO OR TELEVISION SYSTEMS.ALSO IT WAS STATED THAT THE OBJECT WAS AT 200 FEET IN AIR AND IT WAS THE SIZE OF A CAR OR A COMPACT CAR.ALSO MILITARY AND CILIVIAN PERSONNEL HAD THE SIGHTINGS BUT OUT OF FEAR OF GOING TO PRISON FOR 15 YEARS AND A $20,000.00 FINE OR BOTH.MILITARY PERSONNEL WANT TO REMAIN -(ANONYMOUS) -------------------------------------------------------------------- I DIDNOT MAKE A SIGHTING I AM ONLY REPORTING WHAT I WAS TOLD. JAMES , ALLEN , TUTT , JR -MUFON FIELD INVESTIGATOR I.D.# 7606
